definitions.definition: Without limit ; forever, or until further notice; not definite .
examples: Your account will be suspended for an indefinite period of time.
She gave an indefinite answer which nobody really understood.
I'm still indefinite about what I'm going to study at college.

definitions.definition: Being an integral without specified limits.
examples: Don't forget to add the +C when calculating indefinite integrals.

definitions.definition: Designating an unspecified or unidentified person or thing or group of persons or things

main_definition: Without limit ; forever, or until further notice; not definite .
secondary_definitions: ( mathematics ) Being an integral without specified limits.
( linguistics ) Designating an unspecified or unidentified person or thing or group of persons or things
